Academic.Title: Beaker
Academic.Desc: This is a glass griffin low form with pour-out beaker. It was manufactured by Corning Glass Works in the US.

Academic.Title: Phone
Academic.Desc: This phone is from 1957 and was manufactured by Northern Electric Co. Ltd. Canada from Montreal, Quebec.

Academic.Title: Clock
Academic.Desc: This shelf clock (Eclipse model) was manufactured by Pequegnat, Arthur Clock Co. in Kitchener, Ontario. It is dated between 1904 and 1943.
